properties.title: Manufacturing

properties.description: With an ideal climate we see the Tirifinio Region as another location that Tim Hortons has locked in on to produce the finest Coffee beans. Tim Hortons began a partnership in 2005 improving economic, social and environmental aspects of farmers business'. A great tactic if I do say so myself. (Looks really good on the Corporation)
properties.title: Raw Materials

properties.description:
Coffee Bean process in regard to Arabica Coffee.

Planted, red ripe cherries picked, pulped and dried.
properties.title: Raw Materials

properties.description: Brazil produces 25 percent of the world's coffee, mostly Arabica. Brazilian coffee farms on averages are 10 hectares in size and are located in Sao Paolo, Minas, Gerais and Parana. Optimal growing conditions include rainy and dry season that are well defined along with altitudes of 16-24 degrees.
properties.title: Raw Materials
Customer
properties.description:
Tim Hortons has numerous location throughout Canada. Here is one location is Thunder Bay, Ontario where we see the completion of the supply chain process. 

Raw Materials to Manufacturing to Distribution to Customer. This is where us the consumer receives our warm hot cup of cocoa :)

properties.title: Customer
properties.description: One of many Tim Hortons franchises throughout Canada. Shown is the connection between Distribution from Langley, BC to the franchise in Prince George, BC.

properties.title: Customer
properties.description: The final completion of the supply chain process.

properties.title: Tim Hortons Coffee Process
properties.description: While determining an everyday item in which I wanted to examine, I stumbled upon what I had in my hand, a well needed warm cup of Coffee. I decided to take this a step further and felt Tim Hortons would be quite an alluring corporation. With Tim Hortons having more than 3000 restaurants across Canada it was completely unrealistic in regards to mapping. I decided to do a simple supply chain so that I would be able to get the essentials of the process across in an orderly manner. I researched Tim Hortons fundamental process and gave a basic overview to avoid crowding. I hope you not only learn about the Tim Hortons supply chain but also gain knowledge on the growing process of the finest Arabica beans and the interconnections of the good itself.
